reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gotta say a solid , nice bookcase . Went together easy , well made , looks good . Happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price and quality better than IKEA
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase had the exact measurements I was searching for to fit my small space. I bought a total of 3 and they're quite sturdy and easy to build. They include additional tools and materials for you if you want to secure the bookcase to the wall.The backing isn't a flimsy cardboard, but an actual side of the bookcase, so my things were able to fit neatly instead of pushing back against the cardboard and ruin a good square space.The manual is very informative and informs you to be careful and evident in making sure you will be ok. The manual comes in a sturdy plastic zip bag, and includes good quality gloves (which helped my hands a lot), stickers for covering the screw holes once you finish building, and all the tools and materials you need to assemble this bookcase.The shelves are adjustable and fit in nicely once you tighten all the screws when you finish assembling.Customer service from the company is fast and helpful. They're very friendly and hope to solve your problem well.TIP: Don't fully tighten the screws on the right and left side of the bookcase until you finish fitting in the backing and shelves. Leave a few centimeters so there's room for you to fit those pieces in, and then tighten them so they fit snugly.Summary:- Easy to build.- Good measurements for small spaces.- Has tools and materials to secure to the wall if you need.- Backing is NOT cardboard, it's an actual sturdy side of the bookcase.- Manual is very informative and detailed, read it carefully. It includes gloves, stickers, and all the tools and materials you need.- Shelves are adjustable.- Customer service is excellent.!!! Don't tighten all the screws until ALL the pieces are put in, so that they can fit snugly after tightening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT pure white
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of sturdy shelves. Easy to put together, clear directions and extra parts, well packed and delivered undamaged.This would be an easy five stars if it weren’t for the fact that the paint has a dingy yellowish cast to it. Bummer. We are using these in a closet and you can see here the shelves next to a true white closet shelf for comparison. If you can live with this (or don’t mind repainting) I’d say absolutely get it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars at first it was confusing but after contacting the seller it was cleared up
reviews.reviewText: the sellers were quick to respond to my questions. it turns out the instructions were stuck together and after finding this everything else fell into place! great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
reviews.reviewText: Generally I don’t write review on Amazon, but the price which I paid ne quality of wood and product which I got was perfect. This perfectly fits my need for book shelf in my tiny left space in corner. Size was perfect and putting together was easy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Build
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this shelf! Directions were super easy, and I did it all without an electric tool. I used the tools provided. I definitely will buy more of these shelves because I love the different sizes! Also, they come with these little stickers to hide the nails which I love (but I still need to put them on, they aren’t on in my video)! I don’t think I’ve ever had that given to me before. Great little shelf that doesn’t take up too much room and you can always add more to make them seem larger :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The directions could not be more inaccurate and confusing (contrary to what the seller claims about “step by step” directions and them being “detailed”) I do not recommend getting this shelf at all not worth the headache or quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: It’s alright but definitely not worth the price. It was a bit of hassle putting it together coupled with the mediocre quality and it not being sturdy.
